title: DeepMind researcher claims new ‘Gato’ AI could lead to AGI, says ‘the game is over!’
content:
According to Doctor Nando de Freitas, a lead researcher at Google’s DeepMind, humanity is apparently on the verge of solving artificial general intelligence (AGI) within our lifetimes. In response to an opinion piece penned by yours truly, the scientist posted a thread on Twitter that began with what’s perhaps the boldest statement we’ve seen from anyone at DeepMind concerning its current progress toward AGI: My opinion: It’s all about scale now! The Game is Over! Someone’s opinion article. My opinion: It’s all about scale now! The Game is Over! It’s about making these models bigger, safer, compute efficient, faster at…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: Opinions may vary: A DeepMind lead researcher made the bold claim that the company's newest AI was a 'game over' product for AGI research.
